text: is a former Japanese football player. She played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Nagae played for Nadeshiko League club Nikko Securities Dream Ladies. On August 21, 1994, Nagae debuted for the Japan national team against Austria. ==Statistics== Japan Football Association Japan national team Year Apps Goals 1994 1 0 Total 1 0 ==References== Category:Living people Category:Japan women's international footballers Category:Nadeshiko League players Category:Nikko Securities Dream Ladies players Category:Footballers at the 1994 Asian Games Category:Asian Games medalists in football Category:Asian Games silver medalists for Japan Category:Medalists at the 1994 Asian Games Category:1999 births Category:Association football defenders Category:Japan international footballers
title: Terumi Nagae
